ygData.subject: Re: [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: One piece about the below is false.  On the final day in beta, the Gods themselves waged war, and I believe that everyone was turned to PvP.  This event did
ygData.messageBody:
One piece about the below is false. On the final day in beta, the Gods
themselves waged war, and I believe that everyone was turned to PvP. This event
did not happen at the arena. Aradune was slain protecting Karana. And I
believe it was in Nek Forest, but I could have the location wrong.


2. THE FIERY AVENGER

FACT: Aradune once wielded a weapon called the Fiery Avenger that looked like a
Flaming Sword. The Sword had been looted off of Aradune by a player in the Arena
after a PvP event in the final phases of beta. This the ONLY confirmed time
anyone but Aradune EVER wielded a Fiery Avenger. The Fiery Avenger is a two
handed slash weapon with very good damage and delay, and a Direct Damage effect.
REMEMBER ALL OF THE ABOVE IS PROVEN TO BE TRUE.
